spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained, but window placement is inconsistent on the rear and left walls. Door orientations for the laundry and closets have minor deviation from the swing paths shown in the blueprint.

structural_fidelity.notes: Majority of rooms are present. There is a slight wall alignment issue in the hallway/laundry junction which alters the hallway width. The wall between the kitchen and living area is thinner than the external load-bearing walls.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is highly accurate to the floor plan. The kitchen island layout and living room seating arrangement match the original design well. Scale transitions between the bedroom and living furniture are consistent.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric execution. Lighting is soft and professional, and the 3D geometry is clean with zero visible artifacts or mesh tearing.

detected_errors.description: The kitchen windows on the left wall do not match the sizing and spacing of the original floor plan.
The laundry room door swing direction is inverted compared to the original 2D blueprint.
The hallway (Hall 149 sq ft) appears narrower in the 3D render due to the kitchen/laundry wall being slightly shifted right.
